sqlMap.select:
SELECT FROM ((
SELECT FROM discussion d LEFT JOIN discussion_groups t1 ON d.discussion_id = t1.discussion_id LEFT JOIN groupids g ON t1.group = g.group WHERE d.interHash = #interHash# AND (d.user_name = #userName# OR ) ) UNION (
SELECT FROM discussion d LEFT JOIN discussion_groups t1 ON d.discussion_id = t1.discussion_id LEFT JOIN groupids g ON t1.group = g.group , friends f WHERE f.f_user_name = #userName# AND d.user_name = f.user_name AND d.interHash = #interHash# AND t1.group = #groupTypeFriends# )) AS d ORDER BY d.date ASC
SELECT , NULL AS `group`, NULL AS group_name FROM discussion d WHERE d.hash = #hash# AND d.interHash = #interHash#
SELECT count(*) FROM discussion d WHERE d.parent_hash = #hash# AND d.interHash = #interHash#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE discussion SET user_name = '', text = NULL, rating = NULL, anonym = 0, type = 0 WHERE user_name = #userName# AND interHash = #interHash# AND hash = #hash#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM discussion WHERE hash = #hash# AND interHash = #interHash# AND user_name = #userName#
